column2: ## Now add in colored points for experimental trees with labels (add to map backbone)
geom_point(data = holst.subset, aes(col = group)) + #experimental trees, colored by "group" variable
nudge_x = .5, # nudge the text to the right of the point
aes(label = Genet, col = group), # the text is the genet label, and color is "group"
show.legend = FALSE) + # don't add these points to the legend
theme(legend.position = "bottom") + # put the legend on the bottom
labs(col = "Treatment") # change the legend name from "group" to "Treatment"
width = 5, height = 10, units = "in", res = 300) # 5"x10" with 300 pixels per inch
